scenarios.name: Disk full
scenarios.expected_behavior: Service should reject new requests with 507 Insufficient Storage

scenarios.name: Memory exhaustion
scenarios.expected_behavior: OOM killer should terminate process, hive should detect and remove worker

scenarios.name: CPU saturation
scenarios.expected_behavior: Requests should queue but eventually process

scenarios.name: File descriptor exhaustion
scenarios.expected_behavior: Service should reject new connections gracefully

scenarios.name: VRAM exhaustion
scenarios.expected_behavior: Worker should reject new inference requests with 507
